long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Popup and Ads Blocker is a brand new tool for removing annoying advertisings from you browsing experience.
The extension works on all regular content websites, video hostings and social networks like: YouTube, Instagram, Twitter, Twitch, Facebook and others. 

The Popup and Ads Blocker removes almost all common types of Ads like: pop-ups, pup-unders, banners, video ads, chats windows, redirects, etc. 

Users of Popup and Ads Blocker enjoy: better data security and privacy protection, Internet without advertisings, faster connection and unobstructed access to content of any website and social network.

Get all the advantages in one Chrome extension:
1)	No ads
2)	Faster connection
3)	Blocked malicious activities by third-party software
